# Mayor’s Office

## Meet the Mayor

Welcome to the Mayor’s Office. I am Dr. Hilda González. The Mayor of Granger’s responsibilities include:

Hilda was elected in 2024. Her term expires in 2028.

I am usually in the office Monday-Thursday 8:00 am – 5:00 pm.

[Read More](https://www.grangerwashington.org/dr-hilda-gonzalez)
